Hi, I'm Martin Carrasco

Software Engineer with 7 years of experience specializing in backend architecture, microservices, and Event-Driven Architecture. Currently working on high-performance systems processing millions of data points.

About Me

I'm a passionate Software Engineer with expertise in backend architecture, microservices, and modern web technologies. I specialize in building scalable applications using NestJS, Kafka, and advanced architectural patterns.

My expertise includes designing scalable microservices, implementing Backend-for-Frontend patterns, and optimizing cloud infrastructure. I'm passionate about sharing knowledge with fellow developers and contributing to collaborative work environments.

Technologies I work with:

TypeScript Node.js NestJS Java Spring Boot Kafka MongoDB Redis

Featured Projects

Architecture and Advance Patterns

NestJs Architecture and Advance Patterns course project. Understanding concepts from different types of Architectures such as N-Tier, Hexagonal and Event-Driven Architectures.

Source Code

Kafka topic real time counter

Kafka Observer is a microservice that connects to Kafka topics and keeps track of message counts in real-time. It provides REST endpoints to query the current message counts for each topic.

Source Code

Rutify npm package

A Node.js library for formatting and validating Chilean RUT (Rol Ãšnico Tributario) numbers. It provides functions to format RUTs as strings, validate them, and extract the digits and check digit.
